plot outline: A guy falls in love, instantly, thereafter the best friend of the girl attempts series of test on the guy, which the guy passes impressively. Result, the other girl also falls in love with the same guy. The first girl is blind, with a hole in the heart. Growing impatient. That's the specialty. Still, daring to challenge? Then watch it to know who really has a hole in the heart.
title: Eradondla Mooru
plot: A guy falls in love, instantly, thereafter the best friend of the girl attempts series of test on the guy, which the guy passes impressively. Result, the other girl also falls in love with the same guy. The first girl is blind, with a hole in the heart. Growing impatient. That's the specialty. Still, daring to challenge? Then watch it to know who really has a hole in the heart.::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
